verses.name: Isaiah 50:4
verses.text: The Lord God hath given me the tongue of the learned, that I should know how to speak a word in season to him that is weary: he wakeneth morning by morning, he wakeneth mine ear to hear as the learned.

verses.name: Isaiah 50:5
verses.text: The Lord God hath opened mine ear, and I was not rebellious, neither turned away back.

verses.name: Isaiah 50:6
verses.text: I gave my back to the smiters, and my cheeks to them that plucked off the hair: I hid not my face from shame and spitting.
